Parameters: int
int: The maximum value for the progress of this content.
int
int: The progress amount for this content. Must be in the range (0 - max).
setProgress(int, int).Description: Sets the progress information for the content pointed to by the recommendation.

Parameters: @B_java#lang#String_E@
String: A String containing the sort key for this recommendation.
setSortKey(java.lang.String).Description: Sets the String sort key for the recommendation. The sort key must be a String representation of a float number between 0.0 and 1.0, and is used to indicate the relative importance (and sort order) of a single recommendation within its specified group. The recommendations will be ordered in decreasing order of importance within a given group.

Parameters: @B_java#lang#String_E@
String: A String containing the group ID tag for this recommendation.
setGroup(java.lang.String).Description: Sets the String group ID tag for the recommendation. Recommendations in the same group are ranked by the Home Screen together, and the sort order within a group is respected. This can be useful if the application has different sources for recommendations, like "trending", "subscriptions", and "new music" categories for YouTube, where the user can be more interested in recommendations from one group than another.

Parameters: @B_java#lang#String_E@
String: Array of genre string tags that describe the recommended content.
setGenres(java.lang.String[]).Description: Sets the content genres for the recommendation. These genres may be used for content ranking. Genres are open ended String tags. Some examples: "comedy", "action", "dance", "electronica", "racing", etc.

Parameters: @B_java#lang#String_E@
String: A String containing the recommendation content title.
setTitle(java.lang.String).Description: Sets the content title for the recommendation.

Parameters: @B_android#graphics#Bitmap_E@
Bitmap: A Bitmap containing the recommendation image.
@B_java#lang#String_E@
String: A String tag identifier for this recommendation.
setIdTag(java.lang.String).Description: Sets the Id tag that uniquely identifies this recommendation object.

Parameters: @B_java#lang#String_E@
String: A tag indicating the maturity level rating for the content. This tag must be one of the predefined maturity rating tags (see the CONTENT_MATURITY_* constants).
setMaturityRating(java.lang.String).Description: Sets the maturity level rating for the content.

Parameters: @B_java#lang#String_E@
String: A String containing the recommendation source name.
setSourceName(java.lang.String).Description: Sets the source application name for the recommendation. If the source name is never set, or set to null, the application name retrieved from its package will be used by default.

Parameters: @B_java#lang#String_E@
String: Array of predefined type tags (see the CONTENT_TYPE_* constants) that describe the recommended content.
setContentTypes(java.lang.String[]).Description: Sets the content types associated with the content recommendation. The first tag entry will be considered the primary type for the content and will be used for ranking purposes. Other secondary type tags may be provided, if applicable, and may be used for filtering purposes.

Parameters: int
int: An integer value representing the accent color for this recommendation.
setColor(int).Description: Sets the accent color value to be used in the UI when displaying this content recommendation to the user.

Parameters: boolean
boolean: A boolean indicating if the recommendation should be auto dismissed or not.
setAutoDismiss(boolean).Description: Sets the flag indicating if the recommendation should be dismissed automatically. Auto-dismiss notifications are automatically removed from the Home Screen when the user clicks on them.

Parameters: @B_java#lang#String_E@
String: A String containing the recommendation description text.
setText(java.lang.String).Description: Sets the description text for the recommendation.

Parameters: @B_java#lang#String_E@
String: A Content URI pointing to the recommendation background image.
setBackgroundImageUri(java.lang.String).Description: Sets the Content URI that will be used to retrieve the background image for the recommendation.

Parameters: int
int: The status value for this content. Must be one of the predefined content status values (see the CONTENT_STATUS_* constants).
setStatus(int).Description: Sets the availability status for the content. This status indicates whether the referred content is ready to be consumed on the device, or if the user must first purchase, rent, subscribe to, or download the content.

build().Description: Combine all of the options that have been set and return a new @B_android#support#app#recommendation#ContentRecommendation_E@ object.

Parameters: long
long: The running time, in seconds, of the content.
setRunningTime(long).Description: Sets the running time (when applicable) for the content.

Parameters: int
int: An integer id for the badge icon resource.
setBadgeIcon(int).Description: Sets the resource ID for the recommendation badging icon. The resource id represents the icon resource in the source application package. If not set, or an invalid resource ID is specified, the application icon retrieved from its package will be used by default.

ClassDesc: Builder class for @B_android#support#app#recommendation#ContentRecommendation_E@ objects. Provides a convenient way to set the various fields of a @B_android#support#app#recommendation#ContentRecommendation_E@. Example:
